items.title: Financial Statement & Decision Analysis
items.headline: Fundamentals of Financial Statement and Decision Analysis, Vertical and Horizontal Analysis, Understanding Annual Report
objectives_summary: Vertical and horizontal analysis - In this section we will see vertical and horizontal analysis of an income statement results in every income statement amount being restated as a percent of net sales.

Cash flows and asset efficiency - In this section we will learn Cash flow on total assets is an efficiency ratio that rates actually cash flows to the company assets without being affected by income recognition or income measurements.

Understanding annual report - In this topic we will see how every company is required by law to prepare a report for shareholders, which provides the details of the performance of the company over the year.

items.headline: Learn Personal and Family Finance Skills to help you achieve financial independence
objectives_summary: Personal Finance - building a personal financial foundation, getting out of debt to inflation adjusted retirement planning

This class will also come with a spreadsheet that includes inflationary effects on your retirement.  You can take a look at what your retirement picture will look like and quickly make changes to see how a few percentage points here and there can make HUGE differences

items.title: Freeplus Accounting Software

Enter the opening balances

items.title: Personal Finance Made Easy - Tracking Your Expenses
items.headline: Learn to analyze your expenses and habits using a simple monthly tracking sheet. WARNING: No fluff suggestions
objectives_summary: You will learn how to ACTUALLY get your personal finances on the right track. This is not a feel good or motivational course with empty suggestions. This course is designed to take an actionable look at your expenses and habits and adjust your lifestyle in order to get you on a consistent path to eliminating debt and building wealth. WARNING: There are no fluff suggestions within this course
